name: Gold Nyon Statue
description:
## Gold Nyon Statue

In memory of Nyon Lann - Gold Version

The legendary knight responsible for bringing the Goblin Miner, the same goblin who made his armor and taught everyone about the art of mining.

After his death from an injury acquired in the battle of the 3 trees, the people present this statue with his armor to commemorate his conquests.

You can craft this item at the Blacksmith in the game.

## Supply

300

### Crafting Costs

---

- 100 SFL

- 75 Gold

- 1 Nyon Statue

[Link](https://docs.sunflower-land.com/crafting-guide)
